titleStmt.title: A true relation of an apparition in the likenesse of a bird with a white brest, that appeared hovering over the deathbeds of some of the children of Mr. James Oxenham of Sale Monachorum, Devon. Gent. Confirmed by sundry witnesses as followeth in the ensuing treatise.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.O. for Richard Clutterbuck, and are to be sold at the signe of the Gun in little Brittain neere S. Botolphs Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Gun in little Brittain neere S. Botolphs Church
